[appendDomToWorkspace(xml, workspace)](./blockly.xml_namespace.appenddomtoworkspace_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Decode an XML DOM and create blocks on the workspace. Position the new blocks immediately below prior blocks, aligned by their starting edge.


</td></tr>

[blockToDom(block, opt\_noId)](./blockly.xml_namespace.blocktodom_1_function.md)


</td><td>

[clearWorkspaceAndLoadFromXml(xml, workspace)](./blockly.xml_namespace.clearworkspaceandloadfromxml_1_function.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>

[deleteNext(xmlBlock)](./blockly.xml_namespace.deletenext_1_function.md)


</td><td>

[domToBlock(xmlBlock, workspace)](./blockly.xml_namespace.domtoblock_1_function.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[domToPrettyText(dom)](./blockly.xml_namespace.domtoprettytext_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Converts a DOM structure into properly indented text.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[domToText(dom)](./blockly.xml_namespace.domtotext_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Converts a DOM structure into plain text. Currently the text format is fairly ugly: all one line with no whitespace, unless the DOM itself has whitespace built-in.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[domToVariables(xmlVariables, workspace)](./blockly.xml_namespace.domtovariables_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Decode an XML list of variables and add the variables to the workspace.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[domToWorkspace(xml, workspace)](./blockly.xml_namespace.domtoworkspace_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Decode an XML DOM and create blocks on the workspace.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[loadWorkspaceComment(elem, workspace)](./blockly.xml_namespace.loadworkspacecomment_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Deserializes the given comment state into the given workspace.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[saveWorkspaceComment(comment, skipId)](./blockly.xml_namespace.saveworkspacecomment_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Serializes the given workspace comment to XML.


</td></tr>
